job.title: Data Scientist 1
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: emstrongThis position can be based remotely in the continental United StatesbrbrstrongemPrognos is a NYCbased healthcare company whose mission is to improve health by driving the best actions learned from the worlds data In order to achieve this goal we have curated one of the worlds largest clinical lab datasets and are currently deploying cuttingedge technology for predicting disease at the earliest possible timebrbrThe Mission of the Data Science team at Prognos is to develop deploy and maintain analytic and machine learning pipelines within Prognos products addressing businessrelevant problems in close collaboration with our Engineering Clinical and Product teamsbrbrstronguCandidate Profile And ResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongWe are looking for a Data Scientist with a
